Description

Accessing PostgreSQL databases.

IDName

4Begin Transaction

10List Tables
11List Table Fields

13Export Table
14Drop Table
15Import Table from SQL Query
20Import Shapes from PostGIS
21Export Shapes to PostGIS
22Update Shapes SRID

31Export Raster to PostGIS
